quote: If you take advantage of everything that America has to offer, there's nothing you can't accomplish -Geraldine Ferraro
intro: Our current ambassador to the USA is Cecilia Nielse, from Aalburg. Followher journey and discover how it brought her all the way to the West Coast, where she now is living in Seattle.Follow her amazing journey in the American Dream, and don’t forget to check out all our amazing ambassadors and destinations

quote: But Chinese civilization has the overpowering beauty of the wholly other, and only the wholly other can inspire the deepest love and the profoundest desire to learn.    -Joseph Needham
intro: Our current ambassador to China is Marie Nafiki, from Aarhus. Follow her journey and discover how it brought her all the way to the beautiful Chinese lands, where she is now living in Hong Kong. Follow her amazing journey in the mysterious oriental culture, and don’t forget to check out all our amazing ambassadors and destinations

quote: Volunteers do not necessarily have the time; they just have the heart.  - Elizabeth Andrew

quote: He who does not know the Chilean forests, does not know the planet.  - Pablo Neruda
intro: Our current ambassador to Chile is Cecilia Nielse, from Aarhus.
